about_the_game:
Embark on an adventure with a deep story, challenging puzzles, and thrilling action. Created by a solo developer using Unreal Engine 5.

Story:

It is the year 2026. You are a retired Navy SEAL recruited by Albert, a tech billionaire, with the promise of making you rich, you start the quest to find a cosmic stone that belonged to an ancient civilization, at first it's a simple job but with time it becomes an impossible mission

Gameplay:

"Enigma Awaken" offers a rich and varied gameplay experience:

Intriguing Storyline: Immerse yourself in a deep narrative filled with twists and turns, as you uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization.

Challenging Puzzles: Engage your mind with complex puzzles that require keen observation and clever problem-solving skills.

Exciting Adventure: Explore diverse environments, from dense jungles and arid deserts to abandoned cities and hidden temples.

Dynamic Action: Experience thrilling combat sequences and intense action scenes that will keep your adrenaline pumping.

AI-Enhanced Development: Enjoy a game polished with the latest AI tools, ensuring smooth gameplay, realistic environments, and intelligent NPC behaviors.

Features:

Stunning Visuals: Leveraging the power of Unreal Engine 5, "Enigma Awaken" features breathtaking graphics and lifelike animations.

Multiple Locations: Travel across different countries and explore a variety of unique and beautifully crafted settings.

Rich Lore: Delve into a world filled with rich history and lore, meticulously crafted to enhance the narrative experience.

Solo Development: Appreciate the dedication and vision of a single developer, bringing a personal touch to every aspect of the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 570) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months)
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 570) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months)
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

name: Enigma Awaken

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX 6300 @ 3. GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X @ 3.8 GHz or Intel Core i7-7700 @ 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6600 XT or Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: You are a mercenary hired by a billionaire to retrieve an ancient artifact from a lost civilization. Explore diverse landscapes, solve complex puzzles, and engage in thrilling action. This game offers a rich story with surprising events and stunning visuals.
